scenario: Hazardous Lead-Acid Battery Waste Export for Recycling
description: Export of used lead-acid batteries from Canada to USA for environmentally sound recycling

data.9_waste_generator_site_process_generatio: Automotive service center collecting used lead-acid batteries from vehicle maintenance and replacement operations
data.10_disposal_recovery_facility_name: Battery Recycling Solutions LLC - Detroit Facility
data.10_disposal_recovery_facility_address:
2800 Recycling Drive
Detroit, Michigan 48201
United States
data.10_disposal_recovery_facility_actual_sit: State-of-the-art battery recycling facility with acid neutralization, lead smelting, and plastic separation capabilities
data.11_disposal_recovery_operations_d_code_r: R4 - Recycling/reclamation of metals and metal compounds
data.11_disposal_recovery_operations_technolo: Advanced pyrometallurgical process: Battery breaking and sorting, acid neutralization, lead smelting at 1200Â°C, plastic recovery, and secondary lead production meeting ASTM B29 specifications
data.11_disposal_recovery_operations_reason_e: Specialized recycling facility with advanced environmental controls and higher recovery rates (98%) than available domestic options. Facility has RCRA permit and meets all EPA requirements for battery recycling
data.12_waste_designation: Used lead-acid batteries from automotive and industrial applications
data.12_waste_major_constituents_concentratio:
Lead (Pb): 60-65%
Sulfuric Acid (H2SO4): 15-20%
Polypropylene plastic: 8-12%
Water: 5-8%
Other materials: 2-5%
data.12_waste_hazardous_constituents_concentr:
Lead (Pb): 60-65% - toxic heavy metal
Sulfuric Acid (H2SO4): 15-20% - corrosive
Arsenic (As): <0.1% - trace amounts
Antimony (Sb): 2-3% - alloying element
data.13_physical_characteristics_other: Intact batteries containing liquid acid electrolyte
data.13_physical_characteristics_additional_d: Used lead-acid batteries in various states: some drained, some containing residual electrolyte. Batteries are segregated by type (automotive, industrial, motorcycle) and stored in acid-resistant containers
data.14_waste_identification_un_shipping_name: Batteries, wet, filled with acid, electric storage
data.15_countries_states_states_of_transit: None - direct transport from Canada to USA
data.16_customs_entry_office: US Customs - Buffalo Port of Entry (Code: 0901)
data.18_annexes_list:
1. Chemical analysis report from certified lab
2. US EPA RCRA permit for receiving facility
3. Transport contract with SafeHaul Transport
4. Insurance certificate ($5M liability coverage)
5. Facility process flow diagram
6. Safety Data Sheet for lead-acid batteries
7. Route map and emergency response plan
8. Generator site environmental permit
data.18_annexes_other_supporting_documents: Generator environmental permit and compliance history
